text: Chi zhongli de ren, yao xiang zhongle mo de ren yiyang, fengfengdiandian de zhan qilai. Zhe shi yinwei tamen shuo:“Maimai qia xiang zhongli.” Zhenzhu zhunxu maimai, er jinzhi zhongli. Feng dao zhu de jiaoxun hou, jiu zunshou jinling de, de yiwang bu jiu, ta de shi guizhenzhu panjue. Zaifan de ren, shi huo yu de jumin, tamen jiang yong ju qizhong
